thread.title: Seattle Mariners’ Robinson Cano Gets 80-Game Ban

author: Jared Diamond
title: Seattle Mariners’ Robinson Cano Gets 80-Game Ban
text:
Robinson Cano, the Seattle Mariners second baseman whose first 13 major-league seasons appeared to put him on a Hall-of-Fame track, received an 80-game suspension Tuesday for violating baseball’s drug policy. He tested positive not for a traditional performance enhancer, but for Furosemide, a diuretic often used to mask other substances.
In a statement released by the players’ union, Cano said a doctor in his native Dominican Republic prescribed the medication to treat an unspecified medical ailment. Sold under the brand name...
